/zi/config/open.Description: Enable communication with the LabOne Data Server from other computers in the network.

Options.0: "local": Communication only possible with the local machine.
Options.1: "network": Communication possible with other machines in the network.

/zi/config/port.Description: The IP port on which the LabOne Data Server listens.

/zi/about/revision.Description: Contains the revision number of the Zurich Instruments Data Server.

/zi/about/version.Description: Contains the version of the LabOne software.

/zi/about/commit.Description: Contains the commit hash of the source code used to build this version of the LabOne software.

/zi/about/dataserver.Description: Contains information about the Zurich Instruments Data Server.

/zi/about/fwrevision.Description: Contains the revision of the device firmware.

/zi/debug/logpath.Description: Returns the path of the log directory.

/zi/debug/level.Description: Set the logging level (amount of detail) of the LabOne Data Server.

Options.0: "trace": Trace. Messages designated as traces are logged.
Options.1: "debug": Debug. Messages designated as debugging info are logged.
Options.2: "info": Info. Messages designated as informational are logged.
Options.3: "status": Status. Messages designated as status info are logged.
Options.4: "warning": Warning. Messages designated as warnings are logged.
Options.5: "error": Error. Messages designated as errors are logged.
Options.6: "fatal": Fatal. Messages designated as fatal errors are logged.

/zi/debug/log.Description: Returns the logfile text of the LabOne Data Server.

/zi/clockbase.Description: A fallback clock frequency that can be used by clients for calculating time bases when no other is available.

/zi/devices/visible.Description: Contains a list of devices in the network visible to the LabOne Data Server.

/zi/devices/connected.Description: Contains a list of devices connected to the LabOne Data Server.

/zi/mds/groups/0/devices.Description: Contains a list of devices in this synchronization group.

/zi/mds/groups/0/status.Description: Indicates the status the synchronization group.

Options.-1: Error. An error occurred in the synchronization process.

/zi/mds/groups/0/locked.Description: Indicates whether the device group is locked by a MDS module.

/zi/mds/groups/0/keepalive.Description: Set by the MDS module to indicate control over this synchronization group.
